LanguageData.Cassowary.label: cassowary
LanguageData.Cassowary.description: A large flightless bird with brightly-colored feathers. While it looks beautiful, its kick is vicious.
LanguageData.Cassowary_Leather.label: cassowary leather
LanguageData.Emu.label: emu
LanguageData.Emu.description: A large flightless bird with beady eyes on its ugly face. With its bad attitude, it is the jerk of the natural world.
LanguageData.Emu_Leather.label: emu leather
LanguageData.Ostrich.label: Ostrich
LanguageData.Ostrich.description: The largest unmodified bird species, ostriches are known for their fast run, huge eggs, and powerful kick.
LanguageData.Ostrich_Leather.label: Ostrich leather
LanguageData.Turkey.label: Turkey
LanguageData.Turkey.description: A short, fat, flightless bird known for its hilarious 'gobbling' call. It has been long domesticated, but also lives in the wild.
LanguageData.Turkey_Leather.label: Turkey leather
